name: Hydro Hilichurl Rogue
title: "Razorwave Roamer" Hydro Hilichurl Rogue
desc: Hilichurl wanderers unaffiliated with any specific tribe. They can often be found roving the wilds as if in voluntary exile.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Hydro Hilichurl Rogue

skills.name: Slash of Surging Tides
skills.desc:
Deals 3 Hydro DMG.
If an opposing character has Frozen or Mist Bubble Prison attached, this character gains 1 Energy. (Once per Round)

skills.name: Bubblefloat Blitz
skills.desc:
Deals 3 Hydro DMG. Creates 1 Mist Bubble Slime in your Hand.
(Characters with Mist Bubble Slime equipped can use the Technique: Bubble Battle Tactics)
